segments.text: Excuse me , could you tell me how to get to the Cross Bakery building ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Cross Bakery building ? Oh sure . You're actually walking in the opposite direction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you're kidding ! I thought I was heading east .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , east is the other direction . To get to the Bakery , you need to turn around and go three blocks to Broadway . When you get to the intersection of Broadway and Elm , you hang a left . Go straight down that street for half a block and then you'll see the building on your left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , let me see if I've got that . I need to go down Elm until I hit Broadway , then I make a left and the building is on my left hand side . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you've got it . Do you want me to show you the way ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for the offer , but I think I've got it . Hopefully , I won't get lost again on my way there !
segments.speaker: S1
